welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Ans, the charming city known for its beautiful architecture and quaint streets. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all that our wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: A dedicated terminal for handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Maastricht/aachen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 3 hours.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aachen/Merzbruck Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
